Posts.Content: Hi Amanda  I would like to join for support and advice. I have my second chemo tomorrow. Have lost all my hair today so not feeling so good Blackrabbit
Posts.Title: June Chemo Club

Posts.Content: Hi Lee thanks for the words of support. I hope the cold cap works for you. I have looked at what some of the other ladies have said and looks like it should get better within a few days. I also should have had my hair cut shorter. Yes an emotional day but I am getting through it. My second treatment tomorrow and then four to go before and then Herceptin for a year. Good luck with your treatment Blackrabbit x

Posts.Content: Hi Lee thank you for your good luck wishes. I have a wig and some hats/scarves. My head is very sore and tender today so not sure when I will be able to use wig as can only bear a very soft turban on at the moment. Any advice on how to help a sore head Blackrabbit x
Posts.Title: June Chemo Club

Posts.Content: Hi Gn J Thankyou so much for your advice. I had my long hair cut into a short bob as could not bear to shorter straight away. I was not really expecting it to fall out so quickly!! Its good to know the pain will go away in a few days. I will get what is left cut off tonight by my very supportive husband. I love what you say about "kick cancer in the ar*e lady and not a cancer victim" I will be sure to do that when I look in the mirror tonight. I see that you have a link to what to take to chemo I am going to read that tonight and go prepared for treatment 2 tomorrow Thanks for the support xx
Posts.Title: June Chemo Club

Posts.Content: Hi Amanda I had my second FEC treatment today at the hospital. I woke this morning feeling more positive. Thanks for the hair advice. I did the head massage as you said and it helped a lot. I decided to go to the hospital in a nice blue maxi dress with a blue turban which i had tied a scarf around. My husand said i looked luvly just before we left home and nurses at the hospital  commented on how nice and summery I looked. Both which were a huge boost and made me feel even more cheerful. Blackrabbit x
